column5: Mila Kunis and Winona Ryder are both great
Melanie Scrofano and Kristian Bruun are excellent in this as inept family members.
Caitlin Stasey is great as Laura in the promo materials and intro.
Excellent intro kill from Samara Weaving!
Kristen Stewart is so weird in this and I love the performance
Lisa and Louisa Burns as the twins
